review_data.title: Tamarind Hill Indisches Restaurant
review_data.content: Indian cuisine. The restaurant was for us a great destination for lunch. Everything ordered was good and delicious. The portions are large! Excellent service, pleasant place. Highly recommended for lovers of this cuisine.

review_data.title: What a royal place
